description: One of the 50 Skillful Grade swords, Yubashiri was a well-balanced katana with a light blue edge. It was given to Zoro by Ipponmatsu in Loguetown as a gift alongside Sandai Kitetsu.

keyMoments.title: Yubashiri is Destroyed
keyMoments.description: During the battle at Enies Lobby, Marine Captain Shu uses his Sabi Sabi no Mi power to rust Yubashiri, causing it to crumble to dust and leaving only the hilt.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the permanent loss of one of Zoro's prized swords, a Skillful Grade blade that served him well.

significance: One of Zoro's three swords from Loguetown to Enies Lobby
